comments.body:
You should be able to differentiate which side the modifier key was on for shift, control, option, and meta.

Maybe [this Stack Overflow answer](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/10715910/is-there-a-way-to-differentiate-between-left-and-right-shift-keys-being-pressed) helps?
Thanks! Thought the left and right modifiers would be documented with the modifier flags, but seems like they're not :(
